courses.title: React.js Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of React.js including components, props, state, and hooks. Build modern web applications with React.

courses.title: Node.js Backend Development
courses.description: Master Node.js and build scalable backend applications. Learn Express.js, RESTful APIs, and database integration.

courses.title: Full Stack JavaScript
courses.description: Complete full-stack development course covering React, Node.js, MongoDB, and deployment. Build real-world projects.

courses.title: Python for Data Science
courses.description: Learn Python programming for data analysis, machine learning, and data visualization using pandas, numpy, and matplotlib.

courses.title: Mobile App Development with React Native
courses.description: Build cross-platform mobile applications using React Native. Learn navigation, state management, and native modules.

courses.title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the principles of user interface and user experience design. Learn design tools, prototyping, and user research.

courses.title: Database Design and SQL
courses.description: Learn database design principles, SQL queries, normalization, and database optimization. Work with MySQL and PostgreSQL.

courses.title: DevOps and Cloud Computing
courses.description: Learn DevOps practices, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure). Deploy and scale applications.
